mapper.update:
update ORIGINAL_ORDER_INFO
MERCHANT_ORDER_ID = #{merchantOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ID = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCDUT_NAME = #{procdutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCDUT_NUM = #{procdutNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCDUT_DESC = #{procdutDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE_URL= #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BG_URL = #{bgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BY_USER = #{byUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUMCODE = #{sumCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ORIGINAL_ORDER_INFO set MERCHANT_ORDER_ID = #{merchantOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ID = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCDUT_NAME = #{procdutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCDUT_NUM = #{procdutNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCDUT_DESC = #{procdutDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, " PAGE_URL" = #{pageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BG_URL = #{bgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BY_USER = #{byUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
